com.smtp.streamed
Class StreamedSmtpMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.smtp.streamed.StreamedSmtpMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<StreamedSmtpMessage>
public class StreamedSmtpMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<StreamedSmtpMessage>

Used to build a message on disk (never in memory). A partial StreamedSmtpMessage is Comparable to another.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

lineCount

private long lineCount
A line count used to periodically check the disk free space. This control is CPU consuming and can't be tested for each line received.

pfree

private int pfree
The percentage of free disk space to maintain. If exceeded, messages are bounced.

full

private boolean full
true if the message can't be saved.

store

public void store(SmtpResponse response,
                  java.lang.String params)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Store a single line to the message. Constantly checking for too large messages and storage exceeding.

Parameters:
